short_summary: Establish a qualified pool of Suppliers to provide financial advisory services for any one or both of the following two (2) Service Streams: Accounting and Advisory Services and Tax Advisory Services, on an as and when required basis, for a three-year term
description: The Canada Deposit Insurance Corporation is seeking to establish a qualified pool of Suppliers to provide financial advisory services for any one or both of the following two (2) Service Streams...(
full_summary:
**Financial Advisory Services Tender Notice**
=============================================

**Solicitation Number:** 2022-3649
**Assessment Status:** Expired
**Date Published:** 2023-01-05

**Services Requirements:** The Canada Deposit Insurance Corporation (CDIC) seeks to establish a qualified pool of Suppliers to provide financial advisory services for two service streams:

1. **Accounting and Advisory Services**
2. **Tax Advisory Services**

These services will be provided on an as-and-when-required basis for a three-year term, commencing on 2023-04-01 and ending on 2026-03-31.

**Participation Requirements:** Suppliers must meet the criteria outlined in the [Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/05/b79da81cd95523a4b6f38e2572d5fd07/cdic_rfsa_2022-3649_appendix_c-2_reference_engagement_form.docx). Interested Suppliers can obtain more information and download the RFSA from [CanadaBuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Judy Ann Hollander
* Email: Jhollander@cdic.ca
* Phone: 343-576-2218
* Address: 50 O'Connor St, Ottawa, ON K1P 6L2, Canada

**Important Documents:**

* [Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/05/b79da81cd95523a4b6f38e2572d5fd07/cdic_rfsa_2022-3649_appendix_c-2_reference_engagement_form.docx)
* [Attachment 1: Financial Advisory Services](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/05/26d27cf944b7d7d24ea8efd0d522ccab/cdic_rfsa_2022-3649_financial_advisory_services.pdf)
* [Addendum 1 (includes Modification)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/31/fa88ff815aa4b7eacf85d03e8af6f5f6/cdic_rfs
